document_data.name: The Tattooed Troglodyte
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tattooed Troglodyte''' was a [[tavern]] located in the city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the southeast section of the city several blocks from the docks.
document_data.Activities: Considered one of the better taverns in the city, the Tattooed Troglodyte often catered to sailors with coin to spend. The sailors rarely had enough coin for a room and drink, so were often simply tossed out into the street when their coin ran out.
